resources.string: You can install a new version of the app. Don\'t forget to reactivate accessibility service after update!

You have the latest version, but you don\'t have the testOnly version of the app installed. The testOnly app version has several advantages. You can read more on GitHub. Don\'t forget to reactivate accessibility service after update!
Warning: if you will update from usual to testOnly version of the app, device admin rights would be revoken and you would need to enable them again manually.
